modal.fileShouldBeAPNGPNGOrGIF256KBMax: File should be a PNG or GIF, 256KB max

description.descriptions: Add custom emoji that anyone can use in this server. Animated GIF emoji may be used by members with Mezon
description.requireList:
•  File type: JPEG, PNG, GIF
•  Recommended file size: 256 KB
•  Recommended dimensions: 128x128
•  Naming: Emoji names must be at least 2 characters long and can only contain alphanumeric characters and underscores
